casebody.data:
HOFFMAN ADJUSTMENT INCORPORATED, Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
Neal NUSSBAUM, Essie Nussbaum, and Illinois Farmers Insurance Company, Appellees-Defendants Court of Appeals Case No. 45A03-1706-PL-1451 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED December 28, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

VAIDIK , C.J.

Affirmed in part, reversed in part, and remanded.

MAY, J., Concurs.

ALTICE, J., Concurs.
